name: 10 Second Tactics
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51!: the theme was "Every 10 Seconds."

In 10 Second Tactics, you only have 10 seconds to act! If you wait too long, the turn ends automatically, which can leave you vulnerable to enemy attacks. Use the cards in your hand wisely (sometimes wasting them for a chance of drawing a better one).  Empty your hand to beat the game.

Use the mouse and left click to control everything in the game. Click the clock to skip the waiting phase of the turn.

This game was made very quickly for the jam and likely has flaws and bugs, so please treat this more like a proof of concept. Thanks!
